aircraft.value: Hydra Advanced - AC-1680-915 at Base Charlie

defect_observed.value: Wing spar corrosion detected. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Canopy System component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 26/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 29/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 29/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 30/11/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 02/12/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Wing spar corrosion detected. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Canopy System component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
